LanguageData.CAUWU_TradeDialogue_AmbientVolumeMaxTool: Adjust to set the maximum volume for the ambient ship sounds while the trading menu is open.
LanguageData.CAUWU_NegotiationDialogue_AmbientVolumeM: Adjust to set the maximum volume for the ambient ship sounds while the faction negotiations menu is open.\n\n(Requires a reload of the save.)
